VillagerHints.Hint1: Guda was my husband
VillagerHints.Hint2: A valiant knight
VillagerHints.Hint3: of Pella's Wish

VillagerHints.Hint1: Iarlabanki was a member of that table
VillagerHints.Hint2: Square table was it?
VillagerHints.Hint3: No, that doesn't sound right...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Jarlabanki really didn't like the daytime
VillagerHints.Hint2: He loved going out at knight
VillagerHints.Hint3: Hmm...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hallfred was a knight owl
VillagerHints.Hint2: Sometimes we wouldn't see him all day
VillagerHints.Hint3: He as a member of a table

VillagerHints.Hint1: Throst was a knight...
VillagerHints.Hint2: He died last week
VillagerHints.Hint3: I miss him

VillagerHints.Hint1: Æsbiorn died valiantly protecting his king
VillagerHints.Hint2: They awarded him the highest honour a knight
VillagerHints.Hint3: may receive.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Orrin was a knight in the service of the King
VillagerHints.Hint2: He got sick and passed away
VillagerHints.Hint3: I visit him in the graveyard every day

VillagerHints.Hint1: Ofieg was a respectable man
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was in the service of the King
VillagerHints.Hint3: Rest in peace, Ofieg.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Do you get to the Cloud District often?
VillagerHints.Hint2: Oh, who am I kidding, you're no knight
VillagerHints.Hint3: unlike Sigtrygg

VillagerHints.Hint1: my husband, Gunni died in battle.
VillagerHints.Hint2: They recovered his body and buried him honourably.
VillagerHints.Hint3: I'll never forget his posthumous knighthood.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hallveig was a callous man
VillagerHints.Hint2: He didn't deserve to be knighted.
VillagerHints.Hint3: I hope he rots.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Torhild was my brother
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was knighted after his death
VillagerHints.Hint3: For saving the Kings daughter

VillagerHints.Hint1: Thorfrid was a legendary fighter
VillagerHints.Hint2: They say he fought with the strength of seven men
VillagerHints.Hint3: He lays in valhalla now...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Tola was a religious man.
VillagerHints.Hint2: I'm surprised he turned to knighthood
VillagerHints.Hint3: He always seemed like more of a cleric

VillagerHints.Hint1: Ogn was a brave knight who died facing the Kraken
VillagerHints.Hint2: I visit his grave every day
VillagerHints.Hint3: He saved us...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Bjorg was a knight
VillagerHints.Hint2: in the Kings personal retinue
VillagerHints.Hint3: Rest in peace

VillagerHints.Hint1: Yri was my son
VillagerHints.Hint2: He went off to explore the world
VillagerHints.Hint3: Last I saw before his corpse came back was his knights banner in the distance

VillagerHints.Hint1: Gorm was a knight in the Kings army
VillagerHints.Hint2: he led his battalion to victory
VillagerHints.Hint3: But he couldn't beat his sickness

VillagerHints.Hint1: Magnus was a knight in the Kings army
VillagerHints.Hint2: He fell from the tavern roof while drunk

VillagerHints.Hint1: Ubbein was a strange guy
VillagerHints.Hint2: I heard he blackmailed the king into his knighthood
VillagerHints.Hint3: Not sure what happened to him after...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Sigewine was a knight
VillagerHints.Hint2: He led his regiment to many victories
VillagerHints.Hint3: But he got too cocky and lost his head...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Gunnbjorn was a simple man
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was knighted for bringing the people together
VillagerHints.Hint3: Gods rest his soul

VillagerHints.Hint1: Sveni was a knight from out of town
VillagerHints.Hint2: He came here to drink, but had bad blood from some residents
VillagerHints.Hint3: We tried to give him a respectful burial, but there wasn't much left...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Asfrith was a soldier in the war
VillagerHints.Hint2: Not sure what happened, but he was knighted on return
VillagerHints.Hint3: He died in the great plague...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Leiknir was a strange man
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was short and spoke quickly
VillagerHints.Hint3: He was knighted by the king and became his personal advisor

VillagerHints.Hint1: Svan loved swimming
VillagerHints.Hint2: He wasn't the brightest though, and one day forgot to take his armour off before swimming
VillagerHints.Hint3: He sank to the bottom of the river and couldn't get up...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hrifla came to us from Fallkirk, he was a knight there
VillagerHints.Hint2: I believe he died peacefully in his sleep last week
VillagerHints.Hint3: I wonder if his family know...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Northri was a knight of the round table
VillagerHints.Hint2: He kept it a secret, but we always knew
VillagerHints.Hint3: Rest in peace...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Guthrum was knighted posthumously
VillagerHints.Hint2: For risking his life to find a cure
VillagerHints.Hint3: to the great plague

VillagerHints.Hint1: Thorarin... That's a name I haven't heard in awhile
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was a knight of the round table
VillagerHints.Hint3: I don't think he has any family left...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Not much is known about Ingri
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was a wandering sellsword
VillagerHints.Hint3: I believe he was a knight of some far off land...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Thrain lived out of trouble until he was about 18
VillagerHints.Hint2: He wanted to become a knight
VillagerHints.Hint3: but died before he could get there...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Eydis Vandilsson... That's a name I haven't heard in awhile
VillagerHints.Hint2: I heard he was knighted
VillagerHints.Hint3: Not sure why

VillagerHints.Hint1: Oh once was a braggart named Aron the light
VillagerHints.Hint2: He came down from Caelfall as an old sombre knight
VillagerHints.Hint3: And drank til he couldn't get up anymore

VillagerHints.Hint1: Back in the day there was a man called Ondott
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was the fiercest knight in all of Fallkirk
VillagerHints.Hint3: He fought off an entire army of goblins before falling to his wounds

VillagerHints.Hint1: Aye, Øybiorn was a legendary fighter
VillagerHints.Hint2: They say he swung his sword with the power of Odin
VillagerHints.Hint3: He got a posthumous knighthood...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Gufi always loved dogs
VillagerHints.Hint2: He used to bring them on hunts while guarding the King
VillagerHints.Hint3: He was a knight, you know...

VillagerHints.Hint1: XML Dialogue 4
VillagerHints.Hint2: XML Dialogue 5
VillagerHints.Hint3: XML Dialogue 6

VillagerHints.Hint1: Sverting was an angry man
VillagerHints.Hint2: He used to go berserk at people for nothing
VillagerHints.Hint3: Never used to wear any clothes...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Haf was a small guy
VillagerHints.Hint2: Think he was married to someone in the village
VillagerHints.Hint3: He was a strongman

VillagerHints.Hint1: Ljot was an angry man
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was really aggressive when drunk
VillagerHints.Hint3: Took three knights to restrain him

VillagerHints.Hint1: Thokodolf was a simple guy
VillagerHints.Hint2: He really liked ferrets so he lived in the woods with them
VillagerHints.Hint3: He was trampled by a bear...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Ornulf was a strange one
VillagerHints.Hint2: He used to fight in arena battles
VillagerHints.Hint3: He retired to spend time with his family, I think

VillagerHints.Hint1: Wengo was an engineer
VillagerHints.Hint2: But he really enjoyed fighting
VillagerHints.Hint3: Not sure what happened to him...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Øybiorn Olæifsson...
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was a berserker in the Kings army.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Died in '17 I think.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Asbrand was my brother
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was a good guy, but a bit misguided
VillagerHints.Hint3: He wore warpaint before going into battle

VillagerHints.Hint1: Aron was a screamer
VillagerHints.Hint2: He used to shout at his enemies in battle to break their morale
VillagerHints.Hint3: It was pretty successful, til he got hit by an arrow...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Gunnhautr always knew where to hit a guy to hurt the most
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was a berserker in the Kings personal retinue
VillagerHints.Hint3: Not sure what happened to him...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Floki went mad at the end
VillagerHints.Hint2: Killed several people from Caelfall
VillagerHints.Hint3: They brought his body back here at the end

VillagerHints.Hint1: Dyri was supposed to join the army
VillagerHints.Hint2: But he was too much of a liability
VillagerHints.Hint3: They ended up giving him a sword and telling him which direction to go

VillagerHints.Hint1: Arnthor was a barbarian
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was from out of town
VillagerHints.Hint3: He died peacefully though

VillagerHints.Hint1: Haklang was a good guy
VillagerHints.Hint2: Though a bit angry
VillagerHints.Hint3: Think he died in a bar fight

VillagerHints.Hint1: Audun was a knight until he got dishonourably discharged
VillagerHints.Hint2: Then he became a berserker
VillagerHints.Hint3: Not sure what happened after

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hanef was a good guy, but simple
VillagerHints.Hint2: and when he got confused, he got angry
VillagerHints.Hint3: He made a good berserker in the army

VillagerHints.Hint1: Audgisil was a dirty thief.
VillagerHints.Hint2: Glad they did what they did.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Good riddance.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Ingimar was one of those sneaky types eh?
VillagerHints.Hint2: Didn't like the look of him at all.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Hmm...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Ludin was caught stealing from the market.
VillagerHints.Hint2: They cut off his left hand, but he continued anyways.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Filthy thief.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Isulf? Why ya looking for him?
VillagerHints.Hint2: He died a long time ago.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Pretty famous thief 'round these parts actually

VillagerHints.Hint1: Thorfinn was a personal spy of the Kings.
VillagerHints.Hint2: Not sure what happened to him
VillagerHints.Hint3: Heard he was a pretty successful thief...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Gardar Glumsson? That sounds familiar...
VillagerHints.Hint2: Was he the white fox? the brown fox? no, that doesn't sound right...
VillagerHints.Hint3: I think the guards were looking for him.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Thorvid was a petty thief.
VillagerHints.Hint2: He used to distract people with firecrackers then steal from them.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Took a long time before he was caught.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hlodvir Borksson was a criminal.
VillagerHints.Hint2: He used to pick locks for fun.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Glad he went away.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Vidkunn used to break into peoples houses
VillagerHints.Hint2: Just to mess with them.
VillagerHints.Hint3: One day he went into the wrong house...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Finnvid was from out of town
VillagerHints.Hint2: He was caught stealing from the smithy
VillagerHints.Hint3: He didn't make it through the night.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Snækol was looking for a ring
VillagerHints.Hint2: He got pretty nasty about it
VillagerHints.Hint3: Claimed it could turn him invisible...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Vestar was the son of Thrain, a knight
VillagerHints.Hint2: Tired of being in his fathers shadow
VillagerHints.Hint3: He turned to crime...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Tyrkir was always nimble
VillagerHints.Hint2: Turned out, he made a really good thief too.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Till they caught him and chopped off his fingers.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Saksi was a shifty guy.
VillagerHints.Hint2: Settled down from out of town
VillagerHints.Hint3: Heard Fallkirk were looking for him...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Sod Ballisson was the son of the famous thief, Ballis.
VillagerHints.Hint2: He inherited some of his fathers skill
VillagerHints.Hint3: Not enough of it though, he died in a jail cell.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Thorleif? Depends. You a guard?
VillagerHints.Hint2: If you're a guard, you legally have to tell me.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Alright, he was a thief...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hjorleif? He was a criminal
VillagerHints.Hint2: Heard he broke into the castle
VillagerHints.Hint3: Not sure if I believe it...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Mursi is a knight in the kings army.
VillagerHints.Hint2: He's pretty tough, I wouldn't stand in his way.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Wonder how he's doing...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Oleif is a guard around here
VillagerHints.Hint2: Are you looking for him?
VillagerHints.Hint3: He might be off duty...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hreida was knighted recently
VillagerHints.Hint2: He's been a loyal soldier for his whole life.
VillagerHints.Hint3: Why are you looking for him?

VillagerHints.Hint1: Ornulf? Yeah he's a knight
VillagerHints.Hint2: Why do you ask?
VillagerHints.Hint3: Did you see someone commit a crime?

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hrafnvartr is a loyal knight.
VillagerHints.Hint2: He's related to the king, his cousin I think.
VillagerHints.Hint3: As you can imagine, he's usually in the castle...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Iogæir is the kings angry cousin.
VillagerHints.Hint2: He really likes taking the law into his own hands
VillagerHints.Hint3: I'd stay away from him if you can

VillagerHints.Hint1: Blann? He's usually out killing animals.
VillagerHints.Hint2: I'd stay away from him if you can.
VillagerHints.Hint3: He's not mentally stable.

VillagerHints.Hint1: Snorri is a berserker in the kings personal retinue.
VillagerHints.Hint2: He's been struggling with narcolepsy recently
VillagerHints.Hint3: Are you a doctor?

VillagerHints.Hint1: Gardi? Doesn't sound familiar...
VillagerHints.Hint2: Oh, wait! Is he that new guy?
VillagerHints.Hint3: I think he's a berserker or something...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Vigbjord? He's the Kings personal spy.
VillagerHints.Hint2: They call him the Spider.
VillagerHints.Hint3: I hear he always has someone listening...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Lopt? No, I've never heard of him.
VillagerHints.Hint2: Maybe he works for the king?
VillagerHints.Hint3: Some kind of spy or something...

VillagerHints.Hint1: Hreitharr? I think he's one of the kings advisors
VillagerHints.Hint2: He's a slimy guy
VillagerHints.Hint3: Probably a thief

VillagerHints.Hint1: Sigenoth is the Kings brother
VillagerHints.Hint2: He's a bit of a kleptomaniac...
VillagerHints.Hint3: But he has immunity since he's royalty.
